<title level="1" right="Trait">[Unbounded](/Traits.aspx?ID=293)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 254</row>

Planes with this trait loop back on themselves when a creature reaches the plane’s edge.
name: Unbounded
